title: How to Register Your Gym?
steps:
1. Open the official [GymMate Registration Form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScZL9RPcd-EWs88e1ufGWSsRba5s7fANOGbrLJIvaB2PNcJ_w/viewform).

2. Fill in your gym name, address, and contact number.

3. Submit the form ‚Äî you will receive further instructions within **24 hours**.

4. Once we configure the setup for your gym, you‚Äôll hear from us with your personalized Google Sheet link.

title: How to Finish Onboarding?
steps:
1. Open the [GymMate Portal](https://app.gymmate.co.in/).

2. Log in using your Gmail account.

3. After logging in, you‚Äôll be redirected to the Settings screen.

4. Click **Select Spreadsheet** ‚Äî this will open Google Drive. You‚Äôll see a sheet named after your gym; please select it.

5. Click **Save** on the Settings screen.

6. Navigate to the Members screen.

7. Click the **Refresh** button.

8. If you see a member named ‚ÄúUnknown‚Äù, your setup is complete, and you‚Äôve been successfully onboarded.


üìΩÔ∏è Watch this short tutorial for guidance: [YouTube Short](https://youtube.com/shorts/5rWE82An-dg?feature=share)

title: How to Configure Gym Settings
steps:
## How to Configure Gym Settings


1. **Linked Spreadsheet:**
   - Click **Select Spreadsheet** to choose your gym's Google Sheet.
   - If a sheet is already linked, click the edit icon to select a different one.

2. **Club ID:**
   - Your Club ID is displayed here. This is used internally by the system.

3. **App Settings:**
   - **Currency:** Select your preferred currency from the dropdown.
   - **Monthly Fees:** Enter the standard monthly membership fee.
   - **Billing Cycle:** Choose the type of membership period:
     - **Floating:** The period starts from the current date and lasts until the same date in the next month.
     - **Monthly:** The period starts from the first day of the current month and ends on the last day of the current month.
   - **Language:** Select the app language (English or Tamil).
